Module com.pi4j.crowpi
Package com.pi4j.crowpi.helpers

Class CrowPiPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pi4j.common.IdentityBase<T>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.pi4j.common.Describable, com.pi4j.common.Identity, com.pi4j.common.Lifecycle<com.pi4j.platform.Platform>, com.pi4j.extension.Extension<com.pi4j.platform.Platform>, com.pi4j.internal.IOCreator, com.pi4j.internal.ProviderAliases, com.pi4j.internal.ProviderProvider, com.pi4j.platform.Platform
    public class CrowPiPlatform
extends com.pi4j.plugin.raspberrypi.platform.RaspberryPiPlatform
    Custom Raspberry Pi platform class to avoid Pi4J loading the platform providers which do not work out of the box. To achieve this, the method `getProviders` gets overridden to return an empty list of platform providers. FIXME: This can probably be removed once a solution for https://github.com/Pi4J/pi4j-v2/issues/17 exists
